title: About RWF Home Improvements | Premier Fence Installation in Fayetteville, NC
description: Family-owned fence company serving Fayetteville, Sanford, and Lillington. Expert installation of wood, vinyl, and aluminum fences, plus decks and windows.
keywords: Fence Company Fayetteville NC, Fence Installation, Privacy Fence, Wood Fence, Vinyl Fence, Aluminum Fence, Deck Builders, RWF Home Improvements, Home Improvement Sanford NC
benefitsIntro: At RWF Home Improvements, our work is guided by values that reflect who we are and how we serve our community.

benefits.title: Quality
benefits.description: We use only the finest materials and proven installation methods to guarantee long-lasting results.

benefits.title: Integrity
benefits.description: Honesty and transparency are central to our business practices. We keep our clients informed, involved, and empowered.

benefits.title: Customer Satisfaction
benefits.description: Our goal is 100% satisfaction. We're not done until our clients are thrilled with the outcome.

benefits.title: Innovation
benefits.description: From modern materials to energy-efficient solutions, we stay updated on industry trends to offer the best options.

features.title: Family-Owned & Community-Focused
features.description: As a family-owned business, we treat each of our clients like family. Serving Fayetteville, Sanford, Lillington, and surrounding areas.

features.title: Experienced Team
features.description: Our team brings decades of expertise to fencing, decking, window and door installations, and custom patios.

features.title: Lifetime Wood Gate Warranty
features.description: We offer a lifetime warranty on our wood gates, giving you peace of mind that your investment is protected.

features.title: Instant Online Quotes
features.description: Getting started is easy with our Instant Fence Quote tool. We also offer flexible financing options.

ctaText: When you choose RWF Home Improvements, you're choosing a team that cares. From our first consultation to the final reveal, we're here to make the process enjoyable and stress-free.
